thread.title: Gigi Hadid Suits Up in Winter White Athleisure
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid Suits Up in Winter White Athleisure

title: Gigi Hadid Suits Up in Winter White Athleisure
text: Gigi Hadid Gives the Classic Winter White Wardrobe a Makeover February 17, 2017 12:52 AM by Maria Ward Photo: Splash News Bella, Selena, Kendall—a celebrity sporting the fashion-forward tracksuit isn’t anything new. We’ve seen the trend more times than we can count, but today, Gigi Hadid offered up the ultimate palette cleanser when she opted for a winter white version of the look. Earlier this week, Hadid won the   statement coat race in a patchwork motorcycle jacket by Marc Jacobs , and with her latest ensemble, she’s finishing first on the athleisure front, too. Hadid’s simple joggers and silk quilted bomber boasted the same streetwise sensibility with distressed texture throughout. The ruffled turtleneck added a pretty feminine element, with a glittering thread that mirrored the sheen of her outerwear. Oversize sunglasses were a cool touch and tied in with her matching Dr. Martens. But her single best accessory had to be those six-pack abs. In This Story: Gigi Hadid Recommended For You
